name: Doomed Avenger
description:
In a space battle, a space-ninja's fighter ship is damaged and crashes on a medieval and magical world, filled with monster-demons and long dead cultures. You awaken one of the few living gods and they imbue you with the "magic" of the world.

I removed the menu options that don't do anything, just press GameBoy:A button to start.

Originally the "magic" enabled to you move like a normal platformer would, but I over-estimated the game boy input restrictions, and instead planned to make the "magic" provide passive bonuses.

Implemented:

  • You can move around and slash enemies.
  • Skeleton is not smart but is hard to kill.
  • Snake is just pretty to look at.
  • Started implementing the snake's attack, but didn't finish.
  • Started implementing magic, but didn't finish.

Ultimately:

Totally unfinished.  But I want to keep working on it after the game jam, because I really like the concept.
